text: Good massage, convenient location and nice ambience. Value for money massage service and packages. However, old shop name (Rong Spa) still there and confusing when I was looking for the place ya

Excellent Chinese tuina massage from the experienced and friendly masseuse. She has been doing TCM in China for 8years and I feel my tired back recover completely after the session. Good knowledge of TCM will return again!

Banyan Tree Leisure definitely is one of the best spa i have ever visited. The customer service and skill of the masseuse are awesome.  The current promotion for body massage is only $45 per hour, super worth. I strongly recommend this spa. i will visit here more often. :)
Nice ambience and good massage. Therapist is experienced in TCM and cure my body ache
